description:
Client for Invidious, the privacy focused YouTube front end. Clipious is a client for Invidious, the privacy focused YouTube front end. Features:
  • Use own or public server
  • Subscription management
  • SponsorBlock + DeArrow
  • Video view/progress tracking
  • User playlists
  • Background playback
  • Live stream support
  • Android TV UI
  • Audio playback
  • Video and audio download
  • Video filtering
  • Return Youtube Dislikes
